Title: Borsalino
Writer: Jean-Claude Carrière, Jean Cau, Jacques Deray, Eugène Saccomano (book), Claude Sautet
Actors: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Alain Delon, Catherine Rouvel, Françoise Christophe
Plot: During the 1930s, in Marseilles, France, two small time crooks work for local crime bosses until they decide to go into business for themselves.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.
